docTitle.titlePart:
SINGLE-CRYSTALS AS AN INDICATOR OF FATIGUE
DAMAGE

byline.docAuthor: E. E. ZASIMCHUK', A. I. RADCHENCO~ and M. V. KARUSKEVICH~

byline.affiliation: 'Physics of Metals Institute, Kiev and *Civil Aviation Institute,

front.div:
Abstract-The possibility of using specially prepared single crystals as indicators of fatigue damage is
outlined. Resuits are described of an analysis of deformation patterns deveioped in the single-crystal
indicator surface, under fatigue and static loading. It is shown that the density and direction of
deformation bands correlate with the number of loading cycles.
